description: Includes the 100 datasets simulated by Congreve and Lamsdell (2016) <doi:10.1111/pala.12236>, and analyses of the partition and quartet distance of reconstructed trees from the generative tree, as analysed by Smith (2019).
title: Distance metrics for trees generated by Congreve and Lamsdell (2016)

creators.affiliation: Department of Earth Sciences, Durham University
creators.name: Martin R. Smith
